entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story. He is assured by Hermione that they haven't been expelled.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a friend of Harry's and Ron's. She sounds almost as severe as Professor McGonagall when she asks if Harry flew here.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a friend of Harry's and Hermione's. He impatiently tells them to skip the lecture and tell him the new password.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is mentioned as sounding severe when compared to Hermione.

entities.name: lee jordan
entities.description: Lee Jordan is a student who yells 'Brilliant!' and praises Harry's entrance.

entities.name: whomping willow
entities.description: The Whomping Willow is mentioned as the tree that Harry flew his car into.

relationships.description: Harry and Hermione are friends, as evidenced by their conversation.
Ron is also a friend of Harry's, as seen in the story.
Lee Jordan admires Harry's entrance and praises him.
Harry flew his car into the Whomping Willow.
